video.title: La Esclava Blanca
video.synopsis: In Colombia in 1821, a white orphan is taken in by black slaves. Years after being torn from them, she returns to find her family and childhood love.

episodes.synopsis: When Tomás delivers his final payment to buy his freedom from Don Domingo, he asks about eventually buying his wife’s and daughter’s freedom as well.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Tomás and Lorenza leave the area to make a new life with the girls. When Nicolás finds out Victoria is alive, he orders Morales to look for her.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Isabel has delivery complications. Miguel takes Victoria on a secret expedition to the town to prove to her that other white people exist.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín tries to rape Milagros, but she defends herself. Morales lies to Nicolás about what happened with Victoria. The general avenges his son.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Tomás arrives at Nicolás’s ranch with Miguel, who tries to run when he finds out what’s going on. Victoria arrives at the convent in Spain.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Victoria asks the mother superior for her authorization to go volunteer in America. Nicolás won’t accept the money for Miguel’s freedom.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Tomás questions Trinidad as Miguel is being treated. Adela realizes there’s something between Nicolás and Eugenia. Granados gives Nicolás a suspect.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Remedios gives Victoria classes on etiquette, and Adela prepares to receive the marquise. Rosa shows interest in Miguel.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When the marquise appears, they ask her about the men who took her and take her to Eugenia’s ranch. Later, they capture and punish Rubén.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: On the trip, the marquise asks Rosa about her family. Eugenia announces that the chocolate import company partnered with Alonso Márquez.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia fails in the presentation of the processing machine and loses a partner. Miguel blames the marquise’s accident on himself and gets punished.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: General Márquez tells the landowners that the government sent the money for the indemnization of the slaves who will be freed when they turn 18.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Miguel and Victoria spend the day together and plan their trip. At the ranch, everyone’s surprised when Rosa disappears, except Nicolás.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In the city, Márquez decrees a curfew due to the tensions between blacks and whites. Nicolás, Granados, Arturo, Jaime and López fear getting caught.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: The doctor examines Victoria and realizes she’s been poisoned. Miguel and Milagros look for the antidote. Nicolás asks if the slaves saw anything.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: While everyone looks for her among the crops, Isabel and the young man who found her find a warm welcome in a small township. She suffers an attack.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Alonso asks his father why he locked a man up without a trial. Victoria tells Adela she wants to help her with Isabel and tells Remedios her plan.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Victoria is worried because Miguel didn’t return to the ranch, and she defends him when he’s accused of murder. Nicolás helps Miguel escape.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Arturo attends to his son. Victoria asks Nicolás to get married right away. Márquez tells Gabriel he’s going to work for Alonso in cocoa exportation.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás, Alonso and Gabriel help Remedios, who’s unconscious, and Felipe takes Miguel to the ranch. Candela starts a rumor that the ranch is haunted.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Felipe talks with Miguel about his struggle to abolish slavery. Nicolás spends his wedding night with the marquise, but she doesn’t seem happy.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Everyone meets up at the church. Eugenia finds out Adela doesn’t like the marquise and plans to try to annul the marriage with Nicolás.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Miguel finds out everyone thinks he’s dead, and he’s worried because Victoria is married to Nicolás. Remedios asks Victoria not to seek vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Tomás and Milagros she saw Miguel alive and Nicolás saved him. Tomás shows Victoria a photograph of her real parents.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás threatens Father Octavio if he says anything about what happened at the ranch. Arturo tells Jaime he’s going to marry Isabel for money.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Granados, Caicedo and Nicolás tell Arturo they’ll help him with a lawyer for his son, but under some conditions. Trinidad helps Remedios get out.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Isabel visits Gabriel and they discuss Jaime López. Later, she confesses that he’s the one she wants, but Gabriel says he doesn’t deserve her.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Remedios is nervous in the presence of Trinidad. At the hearing, the attorney Restrepo questions Isaías, who’s afraid to talk. Jaime takes advantage.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás arrives at the ranch with Miguel and orders him to work the fields like the other slaves. Ángela proposes taking up a collection.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Adela reprimands Isabel for defending Victoria and confines her to the room. Nicolás and Granados make a deal with the judge for Jaime’s punishment.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Felipe tells Márquez and Alonso to respect the law, which says a slave can buy his freedom. Nicolás punishes Miguel and locks up Victoria and Isabel.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Milagros tells Victoria she can’t get her out of there. Eugenia buys textiles from the latest boat from Europe. Ángela talks with Felipe.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Felipe and Catalina help Ángela and some slaves get out. Milagros helps Victoria meet with Miguel. Graffiti appears on the landowners’ houses.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Granados arrives at Felipe Restrepo’s house with a search warrant. Márquez accompanies him with armed men. Catalina defends Isaías when he’s caught.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: According to Caicedo and Granados, Miguel’s leading the revolution. Catalina is attacked in the night. Eugenia has an intimate encounter with Nicolás.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Felipe receives the news about Catalina and Isaías. Márquez and Alonso say they have no intention of letting those responsible go free.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Gabriel and Jesús plan to allow the slave meeting at the house despite Manuela’s opposition. Trinidad tells Milagros blacks and whites shouldn’t mix.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: After learning that Granados killed the freedmen, Miguel and the other slaves chase him. Nicolás finds out what the blacks spoke about in the meeting.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Miguel admits that Victoria is the Marquise, Edén’s real owner. Nicolás decides to sell some slaves, including Hilaria, to capitalize on his business.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: At the burial, Ángela says some words. After Victoria goes into the pit, a collapse traps her in the tunnel.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Miguel finds Victoria in the tunnel. Granados puts on the military uniform, remembers that they treated him like a slave and leaves.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Abdul and Ayotunde, who is an African fortune-teller who sees the future are introduced. Granados arrives at Felipe’s house to take his wife by force.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás arrives at Eugenia’s house, where Victoria acts as if she were jealous and trying to kill herself.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás decides to change the cocoa transport route, putting Victoria in danger. If Eugenia isn't warned in time, the escape plan could be ruined.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Some bandits assault Nicolás, they steal the wagon and cargo and kidnap Isabel. The child says a woman was in charge.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Victoria is going to hire Ayotunde for the fiesta. When she is just about to find her, Abdul appears. Nicolás accuses Eugenia of robbery.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Bume tells Victoria how Nicolás made Eugenia give up under threat of death. Morales confesses to Nicolás that he never killed the white child.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Tomás is the only one with experience handling explosives and so he offers to enter the tunnel to open the route to get them out of Edén.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Victoria speaks to Ayotunde and realizes that she is her mother, although the fortune-teller remembers nothing.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tries to make Ayotunde remember that she is Lorenza. Isabelita witnesses her father committing murder. Milagros tells Julián she is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Isabel faces up to her father, telling him she knows that he is a liar, fraud and a killer. Nicolás decides to send her to a mental hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Miguel defends Isabel and confronts Trinidad. Morales shoots Nicolás and leaves him on the edge of death.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: After listening to Morales telling the truth about Nicolás Parreño, Victoria is filled with anger and tries to kill her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Eugenia is inconsolable and begs to be forgiven for allowing Bume to become a slave. Miguel, Siervo and Tomás are preparing to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Granados sees the slaves exiting the tunnel and waits for Miguel so he can kill him. A distraught Paca greets Felipe and Ana with horrible news.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Victoria decides to return to Edén to save her father. Manuela finds her brother. Nicolás vows to make an example out of Tomás.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Tomás tells Milagros that she should go with Victoria (and abandon her quest for revenge) so that the child she's expecting can be free.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás meets the real Marquise of Bracamonte and learns that his wife is Victoria Quintero, who came to America for her family and Miguel.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás makes Victoria say that she loves him. He gets a drink from his mother to kill his wife, but he wants her to see Miguel die.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: The fugitives send plagues to the farms and the village people are sick. Nicolás tries to kill Márquez, who hands over the role of governor to him.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Nicolás becomes governor of Santa Marta and promises to speak to the rebel slaves. Tomás meets Lorenza again. Miguel demands the abolition of slavery.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Father Octavio confesses to Tomás and Lorenza that he saved Victoria when she was young. Victoria takes possesion of the hacienda.
episodes.title: Episode 62
